alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbus County through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sidney, or 11 miles southwest of Whiteville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Clarendon, Williams, Crusoe Island and Brunswick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
